subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Tavernari scored a career-high 29 points, and Brigham Young capitalized on Louisville’s injuries for a 78-76 victory in the Las Vegas Invitational.
snippet: Jonathan Tavernari scored a career-high 29 points, and Brigham Young capitalized on Louisville’s injuries for a 78-76 victory in the Las Vegas Invitational.
